程序包 org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter

类 NetworkDatacenter

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.SimEntity
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.Datacenter
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter.NetworkDatacenter
所有已实现的接口:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class NetworkDatacenter
extends Datacenter
NetworkDatacenter class is a Datacenter whose hostList are virtualized and networked. It contains all the information about internal network. For example, which VM is connected to what switch etc. It deals with processing of VM queries (i.e., handling of VMs) instead of processing Cloudlet-related queries. So, even though an AllocPolicy will be instantiated (in the init() method of the superclass, it will not be used, as processing of cloudlets are handled by the CloudletScheduler and processing of VirtualMachines are handled by the VmAllocationPolicy.
从以下版本开始:
CloudSim Toolkit 3.0

    java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> HostToSwitchid
    A map between hosts and Switches, where each key is a host id and the corresponding value is the id of the switch where the host is connected to.

    A map of datacenter switches where each key is a switch id and the corresponding value is the switch itself.
    java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> VmtoHostlist
    A map between VMs and Hosts, where each key is a VM id and the corresponding value is the id of the host where the VM is placed.
    java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> VmToSwitchid
    A map between VMs and Switches, where each key is a VM id and the corresponding value is the id of the switch where the VM is connected to.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • NetworkDatacenter

      public NetworkDatacenter​(java.lang.String name, DatacenterCharacteristics characteristics, VmAllocationPolicy vmAllocationPolicy, java.util.List<Storage> storageList, double schedulingInterval) throws java.lang.Exception
      Instantiates a new NetworkDatacenter object.
      参数:
      name - the name to be associated with this entity (as required by SimEntity)
      characteristics - the datacenter characteristics
      vmAllocationPolicy - the vmAllocationPolicy
      storageList - a List of storage elements, for data simulation
      schedulingInterval - the scheduling delay to process each datacenter received event
      抛出:
      java.lang.Exception - when one of the following scenarios occur:
      • creating this entity before initializing CloudSim package
      • this entity name is null or empty
      • this entity has zero number of PEs (Processing Elements).
        No PEs mean the Cloudlets can't be processed. A CloudResource must contain one or more Machines. A Machine must contain one or more PEs.

  • 方法详细资料

    • getEdgeSwitch

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​Switch> getEdgeSwitch()
      Gets a map of all EdgeSwitches in the Datacenter network. One can design similar functions for other type of switches.
      返回:
      a EdgeSwitches map, where each key is the switch id and each value it the switch itself.

    • processVmCreateNetwork

      public boolean processVmCreateNetwork​(Vm vm)
      Creates the given VM within the NetworkDatacenter. It can be directly accessed by Datacenter Broker which manages allocation of Cloudlets.
      参数:
      vm -
      返回:
      true if the VW was created successfully, false otherwise

    • processCloudletSubmit

      protected void processCloudletSubmit​(SimEvent ev, boolean ack)
      从类复制的说明: Datacenter
      Processes a Cloudlet submission.
      覆盖:
      processCloudletSubmit 在类中 Datacenter
      参数:
      ev - information about the event just happened
      ack - indicates if the event's sender expects to receive an acknowledge message when the event finishes to be processed
